name: Block Jelly Sweet Play
description:
Block Jelly Sweet Play is a block logic brain puzzle candy game, it is completely yummy FREE and brings new puzzle adventures! Jelly Pop Mania: Candy Gummy is a very addictive splash connect lines, row and dots. Play with fresh and colorful gummy candy, so its yummy gummy and super delicious jelly splash.
HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Try to fit them all in the row or column. Then the block will be clear and you get the point. Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
